TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeInvoker extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个扩展点，该扩展点可通过除反射和构造函数之外的其他技术来构造 XAML 类型的实例。

span.span: Provides an extension point that can construct instances of a XAML type through techniques other than reflection and constructors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的用途 是启用可扩展 XAML 类型系统、架构和不完全依赖于 clr 功能（如 clr 特性、通过和的反射信息等）的工作运行时 。The purpose of is to enable an extensible XAML type system, schema, and a working run time that does not rely as fully on CLR features such as CLR attributes, reflection information through and , and so on. 的子类 用作 XAML 架构类（如）的备用构造函数的输入参数 。Subclasses of are used as input parameters for the alternate constructors of XAML schema classes such as . 将从子类中 传递并将传递 到基构造函数。You subclass and pass the through to the base constructor. 除了 为构造函数定义外，还必须为至少部分方法提供重写 `Lookup` 。Along with defining a for the constructor, you must also provide overrides for at least some of the `Lookup` methods of . 具有默认实现。 has a default implementation. 默认实现遵循类似于 XAML 架构类型的默认实现的模型 ，以及 ： clr 类型系统用于实例化、值和查找，包括使用 CLR 特性、 和等 。The default implementation follows a similar model to the default implementation of XAML schema types and : the CLR type system is used for instantiation, values and lookups, including using CLR attributes, and , and so on. 提供基本实例化的方法 () 和方法，这些方法与 表示集合、字典或数组 ( ;; ; ) 的类型相关。 provides methods for basic instantiation () and methods that are relevant for types where the represents a collection, dictionary or array (; ; ; ; ).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现为空。The default implementation is empty. 此构造函数在内部调用以提供的值 。This constructor is invoked internally to provide a value for . 对于 子类，应将 签名用作构造，或提供作为基调用的重写 。For a subclass, it is expected that you either use the signature for construction or provide an override that calls as base. 提供 实现默认模式，其中 是不可变的。Providing the implements a default pattern where is immutable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应返回， `null` 其中对于， 这 不是可写的集合或字典。This method should return `null` for cases where the for this is not a writeable collection or dictionary. 具体而言，应 `null` 在返回的情况下返回 `None` 。Specifically, should return `null` for cases where returns `None`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果不是访问完全受信任的 XAML 类型系统，则此方法可能会向 调用方报告错误信息。If you are not accessing a fully trusted XAML type system, this method has the potential to report false information to callers.

para.span: XAML 集合可能具有多个 方法，因为 xaml 集合可能支持多个内容类型 (参见 ，或参阅 以获取有关 WPF) 中此概念的一个实现的信息。

span.span: XAML collections potentially have more than one method, because a XAML collection can potentially support more than one content type (see , or see for information about one implementation of this concept in WPF).

span.span: The default implementation uses internal logic to return the best match based on the signatures and the type of the supplied .
